alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:48AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Will, northeastern Kankakee, southeastern Cook, Porter and Lake Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1047 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Flossmoor to near Lake Village. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Gary, Tinley Park, Calumet City, Portage, Merrillville, Valparaiso, Chicago Heights, East Chicago, Schererville, Hobart, Lansing, Oak Forest, Crown Point, Harvey, Highland, Blue Island, Munster, Dolton and Park Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
